actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the support of Congress regarding preservation of the South Moresby area of the Queen Charlotte Archipelago in British Columbia, Canada, and to encourage the President to offer the assistance of the appropriate Federal agencies to help achieve such preservation.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress supports preservation of the South Moresby area of the Queen Charlotte Archipelago, British Columbia, Canada. Encourages the President to offer assistance from Federal agencies to the Government of Canada to achieve such preservation.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the support of Congress regarding preservation of the South Moresby area of the Queen Charlotte Archipelago in British Columbia, Canada, and to encourage the President to offer the assistance of the appropriate Federal agencies to help achieve such preservation.
